channel.title: CVE Feed for MinMax Digital Technology -- MinMax CMS

item.title: CVE-2024-5514|2024-05-30T02:14:46.713Z -- MinMax Digital Technology -- MinMax CMS
item.description: MinMax CMS fromÂ MinMax Digital Technology contains a hidden administrator account with a fixed password that cannot be removed or disabled from the management interface. Remote attackers who obtain this account can bypass IP access control restrictions and log in to the backend system without being recorded in the system logs.
